content:
Athletes competed for medals in different track and field events at the $2012$ Summer Olympics in London. The table below shows how many gold and silver medals were won by a sample of nations. 
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
| USA | Russia | Jamaica | Great Britain | Ethiopia | Kenya
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Gold** | $9$ | $8$ | $4$ | $4$ | $3$ | $2$
**Silver** | $13$ | $4$ | $4$ | $1$ | $1$ | $4$
